title: Office Pro 500
description: Professional-grade water cooler designed for medium to large offices. Features hot and cold water dispensing with child safety locks.
shortDescription: Professional water cooler for medium offices

title: Office Elite 750
description: Premium office water cooler with advanced filtration system and touchless dispensing technology.
shortDescription: Premium office cooler with advanced features

title: Office Standard 350
description: Reliable and affordable office water cooler perfect for small to medium businesses. Easy maintenance and operation.

title: Home Compact 300
description: Compact and stylish water cooler perfect for small homes and apartments. Energy-efficient design with quiet operation.

title: Home Deluxe 400
description: Full-featured home water cooler with hot, cold, and room temperature options. Modern design fits any home decor.

title: Home Premium 450
description: Premium home water cooler with smart temperature control and energy-saving features. Perfect for large families.

title: Industrial Max 1000
description: Heavy-duty industrial water cooler built for high-volume usage in factories, warehouses, and large commercial spaces.

title: Industrial Pro 800
description: Robust industrial water cooler with stainless steel construction and high-capacity cooling system for demanding environments.
